property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying, vigilance {T}: When target creature other than Adarkar Valkyrie dies this turn, return that card to the battlefield under your control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: She doesn't escort the dead to the afterlife, but instead raises them to fight and die again.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {4}, {T}: Search your library for a Rebel permanent card with mana value 3 or less, put it onto the battlefield, then shuffle.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The people of Amrou were scattered by war and driven into hiding. Scouts maintain the beacon fires that signal "return" and "home."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Amrou Seekers can't be blocked except by artifact creatures and/or white creatures.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The paradise of Amrou Haven had become a field of cinders. Its people struggled to survive, hoping to see visions of its past in the strange storms that quickly passed.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Split second (As long as this spell is on the stack, players can't cast spells or activate abilities that aren't mana abilities.) You can't lose the game this turn and your opponents can't win the game this turn. Until end of turn, damage that would reduce your life total to less than 1 reduces it to 1 instead.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {1}{W}: Return target artifact card with mana value 1 or less from your graveyard to your hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Memnarch or the vedalken salvage most of the large machines, leaving us only scraps. Scraps are enough."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Changeling (This card is every creature type.) Flying

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Today it flies with the flock. Tomorrow it may wake to find them gone, its body in an unfamiliar form.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Choose one - • Tap two target creatures. • Creatures don't untap during target player's next untap step. Entwine {1} (Choose both if you pay the entwine cost.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant creature Enchanted creature can't attack or block.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: A fight put off forever is already won.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Create two 1/1 white Kithkin Soldier creature tokens. Retrace (You may cast this card from your graveyard by discarding a land card in addition to paying its other costs.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Cloudgoat Ranger enters the battlefield, create three 1/1 white Kithkin Soldier creature tokens. Tap three untapped Kithkin you control: Cloudgoat Ranger gets +2/+0 and gains flying until end of turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Court Homunculus gets +1/+1 as long as you control another artifact.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Mages of Esper measure their wealth and status by the number of servants in their retinues.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {2}{W}, {T}, Sacrifice Dispeller's Capsule: Destroy target artifact or enchantment.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I find its symmetry pleasing. It rids our world of offensive refuse while disposing of itself." - Dolomarus, Proctor of the Clean

property.name: Rules
property.value: [+1]: Create a 1/1 white Soldier creature token. [+1]: Target creature gets +3/+3 and gains flying until end of turn. −8: You get an emblem with "Artifacts, creatures, enchantments, and lands you control have indestructible."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Each player who has cast a nonartifact spell this turn can't cast additional nonartifact spells.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The noble work of our order is to infuse all life on Esper with etherium. Our goal will be reached more rapidly if new life is . . . suppressed."

property.name: Rules
property.value: You gain 10 life. Then if you have more life than an opponent, create a 5/5 white Giant Warrior creature token.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "There are all kinds of strengths, but if you have strength of soul, the others will follow." - Galanda Feudkiller

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying When Flickerwisp enters the battlefield, exile another target permanent. Return that card to the battlefield under its owner's control at the beginning of the next end step.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Its wings disturb more than air.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Creatures you control get +1/+2 until end of turn. Untap those creatures. Basic landcycling {1}{W} ({1}{W}, Discard this card: Search your library for a basic land card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Mountainwalk (This creature can't be blocked as long as defending player controls a Mountain.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The giants believe the fossils they find in Lorwyn's rocky heights are dreams frozen in time, and they treasure them.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Ivory Giant enters the battlefield, tap all nonwhite creatures. Suspend 5 - {W} (Rather than cast this card from your hand, you may pay {W} and exile it with five time counters on it. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a time counter. When the last is removed, you may cast it without paying its mana cost. It has haste.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: All artifacts have "At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice this artifact unless you pay {1}."

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Before the war, we prayed to Kataki to sharpen our swords and harden our armor. Without his blessing our weapons are all but useless against the kami hordes." - Kenzo the Hardhearted

property.name: Rules
property.value: As long as you control a Giant, Kithkin Greatheart gets +1/+1 and has first strike.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Sometimes a curious giant singles out a "little one" to follow for a few days, never realizing the effect it will have on the little one's life.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Meadowboon leaves the battlefield, put a +1/+1 counter on each creature target player controls. Evoke {3}{W} (You may cast this spell for its evoke cost. If you do, it's sacrificed when it enters the battlefield.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Exile target creature. At the beginning of the next end step, return that card to the battlefield under its owner's control with a +1/+1 counter on it.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The landscape shimmered and I felt a chill breeze. When my vision cleared, I found myself alone among the corpses of my fallen friends." - Journal found in Numai

property.name: Rules
property.value: At the beginning of your upkeep, put a spore counter on Pallid Mycoderm. Remove three spore counters from Pallid Mycoderm: Create a 1/1 green Saproling creature token. Sacrifice a Saproling: Each creature you control that's a Fungus or a Saproling gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Exile target creature. Its controller may search their library for a basic land card, put that card onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}: Target creature gets -2/-0 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: He remembers a past of light and healing. But he lives the bitter present - parching salt, scouring wind, and the withering heat of the desert.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying When Sanctum Gargoyle enters the battlefield, you may return target artifact card from your graveyard to your hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: As their supplies of etherium dwindled, mechanists sent gargoyles farther and farther afield in search of salvage.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Tap three untapped creatures you control: Tap target creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It drifts through the streets as a breeze of collective sighs, wilting the bustle with dreams and heavy eyelids.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Choose one - • Creatures you control get +2/+2 until end of turn. • Until end of turn, creatures you control gain "Whenever this creature deals damage, you gain that much life." Entwine {1}{W} (Choose both if you pay the entwine cost.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "No matter how strong, an unarmed fighter is no more than a fool."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Destroy target artifact or enchantment. You gain life equal to its mana value.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The jeweler, the potter, the smith . . . They all imbue a bit of their souls into their creations. The kami destroy that crafted mortal shell and absorb the soul within." - Noboru, master kitemaker

property.name: Rules
property.value: Prevent the next 3 damage that would be dealt to target creature this turn. For each 1 damage prevented this way, put a +1/+1 counter on that creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Those who survive the test bear a mark of power anyone can recognize.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Give me a sword and I'll kill a few enemies. But give me a hammer and a fiery forge, and I'll turn the tide of battle."

property.value: "Sages who take the time to verify their sources are rewarded for their diligence." - Jhoira, to Teferi

property.value: The greatest masters of the craft abandon tools altogether, shaping metal with hand and mind alone.

property.value: When the School of the Unseen fell, so many magical treasures lay abandoned that no amount of death could deter the stream of thieves and desperate scholars.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The fae know when they're not wanted. That's precisely why they show up.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Know one part of the name, obsession begins. Know two parts, paranoia sets in. Know three parts, madness descends. Know all, and only the kami know what will become of you." - Lady Azami

property.value: Takenuma was filled with a chorus of moans, shrieks, and wails. Some came from the living, some from the dying, and some, most horribly, from the dead.

property.value: The line between dream and death is gauzy and fragile. She leads those too near it from one side to the other.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: In life, it was a fetid, disease-ridden thing. In death, not much changed.

property.value: Among the solitude-loving giantkind, teamwork is unusual. But he appreciates hearing the occasional "Swing down and to your left."

property.value: {R}, Return Grinning Ignus to its owner's hand: Add {C}{C}{R}. Activate only as a sorcery.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Take care what you offer the ignus. Food, perhaps. Coins. But nothing flammable!" - Stovic, village eccentric

property.name: Rules
property.value: Echo {5}{R} (At the beginning of your upkeep, if this came under your control since the beginning of your last upkeep, sacrifice it unless you pay its echo cost.) When Hammerheim Deadeye enters the battlefield, destroy target creature with flying.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Haste {T}: Create a token that's a copy of target nonlegendary creature you control, except it has haste. Sacrifice it at the beginning of the next end step.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Lava Spike deals 3 damage to target player or planeswalker.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Some kami attacks during the war were rife with trickery, subterfuge, and subtlety, draining hope and pride from the mortal world. Other attacks were a lot more straightforward.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Echo {1}{R} (At the beginning of your upkeep, if this came under your control since the beginning of your last upkeep, sacrifice it unless you pay its echo cost.) When Mogg War Marshal enters the battlefield or dies, create a 1/1 red Goblin creature token.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying {R}: Pardic Dragon gets +1/+0 until end of turn. Suspend 2 - {R}{R} Whenever an opponent casts a spell, if Pardic Dragon is suspended, that player may put a time counter on Pardic Dragon.

property.name: Rules
property.value: If an instant or sorcery source you control would deal damage to a permanent or player, it deals that much damage plus 2 to that permanent or player instead. At the beginning of each end step, discard your hand.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Rift Bolt deals 3 damage to any target. Suspend 1 - {R} (Rather than cast this card from your hand, you may pay {R} and exile it with a time counter on it. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a time counter. When the last is removed, you may cast it without paying its mana cost.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "It's difficult to heal a rift after it begins wandering about on its own." - Teferi

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying When Ryusei, the Falling Star dies, it deals 5 damage to each creature without flying.

property.name: Rules
property.value: As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice an artifact. Shrapnel Blast deals 5 damage to any target.

property.name: Rules
property.value: At the beginning of your upkeep, you may return Squee, Goblin Nabob from your graveyard to your hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Some goblins are expendable. Some are impossible to get rid of. But he's both - at the same time!" - Starke

property.name: Rules
property.value: Echo {3}{R} (At the beginning of your upkeep, if this came under your control since the beginning of your last upkeep, sacrifice it unless you pay its echo cost.) When Stingscourger enters the battlefield, return target creature an opponent controls to its owner's hand.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Giant spells you cast cost {2} less to cast.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Boggarts constantly strive to outdo each other with the things they bring back to the warren, each hoping the exploit will become as well-known as those of Auntie Grub.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Split second (As long as this spell is on the stack, players can't cast spells or activate abilities that aren't mana abilities.) Sudden Shock deals 2 damage to any target.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Arc mages aren't known for their patience.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}, Sacrifice a Goblin: Tar Pitcher deals 2 damage to any target.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Auntie Grub had caught a goat, a bleating doe that still squirmed in her arms. At the same time, her warren decided to share with her a sensory greeting of hot tar . . . ." - A tale of Auntie Grub

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Thundercloud Shaman enters the battlefield, it deals damage equal to the number of Giants you control to each non-Giant creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: He cares not for the disasters his storm brings as long as his path ahead is clear.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Haste (This creature can attack and {T} as soon as it comes under your control.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The giant was felt a few seconds before he was seen.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Torrent of Stone deals 4 damage to target creature. Splice onto Arcane - Sacrifice two Mountains. (As you cast an Arcane spell, you may reveal this card from your hand and pay its splice cost. If you do, add this card's effects to that spell.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Aren't there boggarts enough in Lorwyn? Couldn't it turn into a sheep? Or a sunflower?" - Olly of Goldmeadow

property.name: Rules
property.value: Kicker {2}{G} (You may pay an additional {2}{G} as you cast this spell.) When Citanul Woodreaders enters the battlefield, if it was kicked, draw two cards.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: They seek out living trees to glean age-old secrets from sap and wood.

property.name: Rules
property.value: If an effect would create one or more tokens under your control, it creates twice that many of those tokens instead. If an effect would put one or more counters on a permanent you control, it puts twice that many of those counters on that permanent instead.

property.value: When Eternal Witness enters the battlefield, you may return target card from your graveyard to your hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: She remembers every word spoken, from the hero's oath to the baby's cry.

property.value: Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature, two +1/+1 counters on another target creature, and three +1/+1 counters on a third target creature.
